actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Appropriations.

official_title: A joint resolution approving the report of the President submitted under section 252(c)(2)(C)(i) of the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficity Control Act of 1985, as amended.

summary.text: Approves the report of the President under the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985 with respect to changes in outlay reductions within the defense major functional category of the budget.

titles.title: A joint resolution approving the report of the President submitted under section 252(c)(2)(C)(i) of the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficity Control Act of 1985, as amended.
